module: The Test_maxAbsValueCir module functions as a testbench for evaluating various maxAbsValueCir circuits, aiming to determine maximum or absolute values from 4-bit inputs w1, w2, and w3. It achieves this by using internal wire signals out, out_eq, and out_net to collect outputs from three instantiated circuits corresponding to different configurations of the maxAbsValueCir. Input changes drive updates to a 12-bit data bus and a 32-bit address counter, interfacing with a memory module which leverages these signals for memory operations, controlled by inputs and a global reset. This setup provides a robust environment for circuit validation and data management.
